turns.text: Do you uh have family budget or how do you work your budgeting
turns.label: qy

turns.text: Well for many many years uh my wife and I did have budget Uh we were both working at the time and so forth and uh that - we had to do that until we finally got the house paid for and and other big bills taken care of
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: Uh we have budget but not as strict now as we used to because we dont have quite such tight financial situation
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: So it its uh its helpful I mean yes having budget is very very important and that did get us so that you know the house is paid for and uh other major things are taken care of and now we can relax little bit more because basically we dont really require as much on daily or monthly basis as we did before so we dont have to have quite as strict uh budget as we did
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh well we dont have real strict budget Uh we have low budget to work on but we uh you know - for like groceries we say about this much per week and then --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Sure uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- we just spend about so much We dont I I dont know of written figure of expenses that we you know keep to or anything but I know that I go to the grocery store that we always stick within you know five dollars between here and there
uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: certain amount
turns.label: sd

turns.text: I think Ive I do that automatically myself
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: I mean I unconsciously uh you know stay in within with certain amount because I I have enough food already stored here --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- that I dont have to make any large purchase at any one time All I normally do now is pick up little things here and there If the salt goes out or we need sugar or something like that
Wow thats great
turns.label: ba

turns.text: Yeah we have two freezers and course we have large garden here that we grow lot of our own stuff and we freeze lot of that so lot of the vegetables are taken care of in our own --
turns.label: b

turns.text: Oh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- - personal storage
Oh you guys sound pretty self sufficient
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Well we we keep little note pad on on wall - - if anything is absolutely out make note of it and then uh the next time I go to the store why I pick it up and fill it up
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Huh

turns.text: So its its worked very well that way That way we you know if each of us finds something is missing uh we put it up Uh the other person might not know about it
turns.label: sd

turns.label: sd

Lets see the other thing there the topic was talking about was if if uh - all I can think of is if you dont keep real real tight budget how do you control expenses but uh one - another thing that we do is we always fly back to California and Washington each Christmas Well not fly back - but somehow we get back there
